message: Hey guys I have a question
I'm using the input params to create a new AR object, then save it
I'm wondering, what if the user hacks the param names and changes user[email] to for example user[id]
how can I protect columns from getting written to?

See the attr_accessible and attr_protected methods; ActiveRecord also protects the primary_key and inheritance_column fields from mass assignment by default, so you never have to worry about id being assigned.
